   Running down the halls of the Sacrilege Plague, Lobstruck turns 
the corner and runs into Lepord and Lady Right.(Literally)  The 3 
bots pick themselves off the floor.  

   "Watch where you going!"  Yells Lobstruck.

   "Why don't you watch where you are going!"  Yells Lepord back.

   "Lepord, calm down."  says Lady Right, "So Lobster breath, why did 
you run into us?"

   "Because we got an intruder."  Lobstruck yells back.

   Just then UltraByte comes on the Lobstruck comm. 
system. "Lobstruck, he busted the comm unit."

   "Okay, do you want me to bring Lady Right and Lepord with me."  
Lobstruck says.

   "Yes."  UltraByte says, "that will be perfect."

   "Okay."  Lobstruck says as the 3 bots run for where the intruder 
is located.
